FuncDef:
The map ipv4-tos command sets a ToS value for IPv4 packets.
The undo map ipv4-tos command deletes a ToS value for IPv4 packets.
By default, a device copies the Traffic-class field value in IPv6 packets and pastes it to the ToS field value in IPv4 packets.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ToS value of IPv4 packets in the inbound direction of a MAP-T instance.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 255.

ExtraInfo:
To set a ToS value in IPv4 packets, run the map ipv4-tos command. To delete the setting, run the undo map ipv4-tos command.
The ToS value in IPv4 packets is the ToS field value carried in the packet header. By default, a device copies the Traffic-class field value in IPv6 packets and pastes it to the ToS field value in IPv4 packets.
